title: Very helpful if you own devices on  ecosystem
body: I purchased this product to use it with my iphone and ipad, whose use has grown due to the online meeting and videoconferencing calls in this pandemic. The airpods are on the pricier side, thanks to the  branding. In today's era when wireless earbuds are available for as low as 2k, why settle for these?? I have some reasons of my own, which may/may not fit your case. Read on to decide.  1. Seamless connectivity with  devices: the most important reason for me. Once I connected it to my phone, it automatically connects with my ipad signed in to the same  ID. No pairing/unpairing/repairing required. This adds a great value to the user experience. Just take out your TWS from the case and they are good to go!  2. Connection with multiple devices simultaneously: The airpods connect both to my ipad and phone. I can pick up my calls on my phone, switch to airpods and continue with my call. In case of another device, I would first need to unpair, repair and continue my call. This is another big bonus for me and simplifies things!  3. Good connectivity range and battery life: Battery life is decent. Will last you through long sessions of calls and online meetings. You can use mono or both airpods as per your choice.  What should you keep in mind before purchasing:  1. Price: These are some of the costliest devices in this category in the market. So you need to be doubly sure that they justify their value to you before you buy them.  2. Sound quality: Don't expect earth shattering bass from these. They are good to go daily use earphones. Powerful bass gives me a bad headache. Hence this was a bonus for me. However, the sound quality will be deal breaker for many. Do try them and listen to your playlist before you decide.  3. Strange shape: They fit perfectly into some ears while being a pain for others. Again, my advice is to try them in your ears before you purchase. If they feel uncomfortable after 5 minutes, you will regret buying them. You can purchase additional rubber pads/hooks for a good fit, but again that will set you back by 300-500 bucks. Hence, caution is advised!  Sincere advice: If you are buying them just to show your status quo of owning an  device ( many people do this, including myself - its absolutely normal with ), there are cheap lookalikes available for 200-500 bucks. Buy them, flaunt them and use the remaining sum in some other place!  For those looking to buy these for sound quality, do give these a try before purchasing. It may save you a lot of heartache later!  If you have reasons similar to mine, these airpods are excellent value for money, thanks to their good handshake with the  ecosystem. Wireless charging variant is a gimmick in my opinion - again see if you can justify shelling out those extra bucks for the ease of wireless charging these maybe once a week!  Hope the review helps!  PS: Do buy a case; these are very prone to scratches given their glossy finish!

title: Is it really for you?
body: Apple Airpods are one of the best pieces of technology ever built by apple. If you buy one, you'll hold one of the most complicated designed but a very well built piece of tech at this price.  My first glance at the Airpods was pretty delusional. Still being in the Apple ecosystem I wanted to try it. You will never experience the same pairing method in any other wireless earbud. Thanks to the H1 chip inside it. Pop the case open, hold it near your device and magic begins. The older versions of iPhone may have a tough time connecting to it because the W1 chip was introduced from iPhone 7 onwards. If you have one and find yourself struggling connecting to your device, it's normal.  I personally find the Airpods a great fit and they do not fall from your ears even when you're running or sweating in the gym. The audio is well balanced and are comparable to the Apple Earpods. Sometimes even better. If you're an audiophile and a bass person, go for a better option like the Powerbeats pro. Another pro is the ergonomics and design of Airpods. They fit inside your denim's coin pocket perfectly. Yes they're that small.  Touch controls are sometimes hard to get right. You don't tap on the Airpods but to hit hard on it with your finger couple times to get it working. The touch controls can be customised by getting into the bluetooth menu. "Hey siri" is always on listening mode so you can make calls, get directions, send texts, set reminders, change volume levels and much more.  So is it really for you? Well, it depends. If you're into Apple Ecosystem, have some decent amount of money to spare and you're looking for wireless earbuds to listen to music and attend calls, go for it. They are also great for people who travel thanks to its compact size. If you're into audio monitoring, sound design, video editing or some similar professional work, this might not be the ideal option.  To conclude, Airpods are an amazing piece of technology ever built by Apple. They won't let you down if you're into listening to music, attending calls and give instructions to siri. If you have one already and are disappointed, they are not meant for you. Look for a better option.

title: It’s ok but after an year facing microphone issues
body: After using the AirPods 2 for more than a year, it was a good overall experience. Definitely worth it if you have multiple apple devices like iphone, macbook etc and your AirPods can easily switch among them easily. Major issue which I’m facing is with the microphone. Nobody seem to hear my voice during voice call. It’s really frustrating. Mics are not consistently picking my voice during phone calls or even Siri is not able to listen to my commands as mics are not working properly.

title: Genuine Apple Airpods. Connects seamlessly
body: I went through a lot of reviews before ordering this from Amazon. I was apprehensive as some reviews mentioned they received fake or used products.  On receiving the product the first thing I did was check the genuineness of the product in Apple website. It was genuine. And similar to other Apple products syncs seamlessly.  Also there are a lot of reviews on noise cancellation. Apple does not advertise AirPods as noise cancellation earphones. They come with Noise Reduction tech.  I am deducting a star on the premise that I had to struggle with the warranty period. When I received the item it was mentioned as October 2021. And I had to contact Apple Care and provide them with Invoice and PD copy for the warranty period to be corrected. It took about 24 hrs but thankfully it is updated now.

title: Best TWS under 12k
body: I've been using these Airpods since last 3 weeks and the experience with iPhone has been flawless. Yes u can find TWS having Better sound and bass but it's the convenience of the apple ecosystem that you are paying for and to be very frank I didn't find anything wrong while Calling or listening to music.  Calling: Call clarity has been fantastic, No voice break or jitter while talking to someone. Bass has been good if not fantastic.  Siri: Siri has been life saver for me, it's like U just have to ask your personal "Jarvis" and it'll do most of the things for u.  Battery : On a full charge it can work for almost 4 hours straight and trust me that's enough for a single time use and you can charge you pods atleast 2 times again from the case.  Comfort: Using them for long time ( atleast 1 hour) can create discomfort in your ears since they don't have silicon tips but plastic head  Overall a good package and a recommendable product for all  P.S : I've put a case on my earpods so please don't ask Amazon to ship it complimentary 😆

title: Battery backup
body: After using 6 months airpods single time battery backup is only 90 min and that is not sufficient after spending 13000rs And I’m not happy from APPLE Product sound quality is good but battery backup is not sufficient. And I recommend don’t buy apple products from amazon flipkart .Buy only from apple Store.

title: Super Product by Apple
body: Initially I was very skeptical in buying apple product from amazon but eventually I did and also made an unboxing video just to make sure that I dont get a stone inside the packet but yes, amazon hasn’t disappointed me even once in 3 yrs of being there customer and neither did it happen this time. I had been using friend’s airpods for a while now but thought of buying my own after amazon gave a good deal at it. The airpods are really comfy and good. the battery life is too good. I charge my case for an hour in which it fully charges and with one charge the airpods actually lasts upto 24hrs of usage. If somebody is confused between buying the new pro or this one and has a budget constraint, I would recommend you go for this one coz the only plus point in the pro ones is the sweat resistance and noise cancellation. pretty much everything else about 2 is better than Pro. PS. my stars would go down because I gave noise cancellation 2 stars.

title: Works like a charm, although I wish I had got a better piece.
body: The amazon delivery was fast and that really needs to be appriciated , good work amazon !! I have been using the product for 3 days now and like all apple products it works like a charm, coming to the build quality of the product I feel I have received a slightly damaged product , the hinge of the charging case is slightly loose (can live with it) and the battery of the charging case seems to drain fast, this I am sure because this is my second AirPods. Other than that I have no complaints, the audio quality is as expected.

title: Expensive Ear Phones! Quality Comes with price!
body: They are the best with your iPhone, iPad and if you have Mac too! They connect seamlessly and gives you and immersive experience of the music. Try to listen in HD quality. For Calls absolutely perfect they don’t give pain or generate heat. Best part is they are very light and gives peace to ears. It is an amazing upgrade from the other bt devices. I have received a Second Gen Device!

title: Genuine and Good airpods!
body: Thank you Amazon for the fast delivery! I received the product safely and without any damage. Obviously it’s not a fake product, it’s a genuine Apple Air pods. Noise cancellation is okay not up to the mark, sound quality is awesome when compared to other devices in the market and battery life is good not the best. I get a clicking sound on the sides of the case lid when pressed on the either side intentionally , I though it’s a defect but then I got to know it’s there in almost every apple airpods now a days. Otherwise it is a completely good airpods!

title: Good Design and Lightweight Earpods
body: If you like to listen to music very often then this pods can help you. The sound quality of the pods is well maintained. If you play on the full volume the other person sitting next to you can also hear the song. The noise cancellation part I didn't like about it as the various sound I can then also experience. The battery life is 4-5 hours on a continuous usage basis.  It is light in weight and the size is portable as you can carry it anywhere where you like. It charges quickly. With the help of various sensors like removing the pods from ears can pause the music but this feature works when paired with Apple phones.

title: Reliable quality
body: Earlier I was using another bluetooth stereo ear piece pair. Within a week it stopped pairing with each other. I wasu sing it as a mono. But, with airpods, it is a different matter. They always work flawlessly and pair readily. Sound quality is superlative. The fit in the ears is a proplem. They tend to fall off sometimes. Next higher model can be customised to suit individual needs. But, costs another nine thousand more! This airpod itself is quite expensive.

title: one of the best true wireless earbuds
body: Pros :  - Best connectivity - Connection is automatic, it connects to your iPhone as soon as you take your Airpods near to your iPhone.  - Portable - Comes in handy, can fit into you pockets and easy to carry anywhere.  cons : - Not the best fit - before buying the Air-pods, please check if an of your friends have ear pods and they fit you good. - Sound isn't great when compared to Sony wf-1000xm3

title: Amazing product
body: These are a great pair of earphones. They pair easily with Apple devices and also sound great. I wouldn't say these have great bass but it's good enough for what it is, not in ear buds. Please ignore all the pictures and reviews about clicking sounds made by the case lid and unaligned earpiece and all; that's how they're designed to be and the clicks are evident because it's magnetic. Coming to the fit; it does not give me great confidence that it'll remain in my ears which is why I wouldn't give it a full 5 rating. I've ordered a pair of rubber buds for these from aliexpress which I believe will solve this problem.

title: Waste of money, like normal headphone, never buy it by mistake
body: Very bad bass, never bye honestly. Better you can buy Boult tru5ive pro. Sound quality same as apple wired headphone. Waste of money.

title: Very good - only issue is that microphone is terrible when connected to the laptop
body: This is excellent for listening - sound quality and noise cancellation is very good. Microphone for phone calls is good. However, microphone when connecting to laptop is terrible. I have a Macbook, and when I connect to calls through the Mac, the other side finds my voice very distorted and poor. This is a common issue with the Airpods.

title: apple is premium
body: connectivity is best sound quality is not excellent but good it doesn’t not support noise cancellation as per i used it is not that comfortable i am experienced some pain in initial use  siri activated by just say hey siri is the feature which i loved it  at this price point it should more comfortable better sound quality noise cancellation

title: Underwhelming Sound - Excellent Ecosystem Tieup - Overall, A+
body: The best part of the product is that it really works well in the Apple ecosystem with smooth connection transfers. Sound quality is good; no doubt, but might be over hyped. Happy with the purchase though. Microphone clarity is industry best. Might want to have a look over One plus buds before making a purchase decision. Works best if you are ensconced in the apple ecosystem.

title: Premium Choice 
body: They sound incredibly better than many of the ear buds available in the market. The case looks super premium and so does AirPods. The battery life is quite decent, no complaints. However, I returned the product because of fitting issues with my left ear, it falls out very easily. I would suggest everyone to try fitting once before buying the product, else every other thing is just as premium as the brand name is. Also, it lacks in Noise Cancellation and you would be able to hear the traffic while travelling.

title: Is it really for you?
body: Apple Airpods are one of the best pieces of technology ever built by apple. If you buy one, you'll hold one of the most complicated designed but a very well built piece of tech at this price.  My first glance at the Airpods was pretty delusional. Still being in the Apple ecosystem I wanted to try it. You will never experience the same pairing method in any other wireless earbud. Thanks to the H1 chip inside it. Pop the case open, hold it near your device and magic begins. The older versions of iPhone may have a tough time connecting to it because the W1 chip was introduced from iPhone 7 onwards. If you have one and find yourself struggling connecting to your device, it's normal.  I personally find the Airpods a great fit and they do not fall from your ears even when you're running or sweating in the gym. The audio is well balanced and are comparable to the Apple Earpods. Sometimes even better. If you're an audiophile and a bass person, go for a better option like the Powerbeats pro. Another pro is the ergonomics and design of Airpods. They fit inside your denim's coin pocket perfectly. Yes they're that small.  Touch controls are sometimes hard to get right. You don't tap on the Airpods but to hit hard on it with your finger couple times to get it working. The touch controls can be customised by getting into the bluetooth menu. "Hey siri" is always on listening mode so you can make calls, get directions, send texts, set reminders, change volume levels and much more.  So is it really for you? Well, it depends. If you're into Apple Ecosystem, have some decent amount of money to spare and you're looking for wireless earbuds to listen to music and attend calls, go for it. They are also great for people who travel thanks to its compact size. If you're into audio monitoring, sound design, video editing or some similar professional work, this might not be the ideal option.  To conclude, Airpods are an amazing piece of technology ever built by Apple. They won't let you down if you're into listening to music, attending calls and give instructions to siri. If you have one already and are disappointed, they are not meant for you. Look for a better option.

title: Very helpful if you own devices on  ecosystem
body: I purchased this product to use it with my iphone and ipad, whose use has grown due to the online meeting and videoconferencing calls in this pandemic. The airpods are on the pricier side, thanks to the  branding. In today's era when wireless earbuds are available for as low as 2k, why settle for these?? I have some reasons of my own, which may/may not fit your case. Read on to decide.  1. Seamless connectivity with  devices: the most important reason for me. Once I connected it to my phone, it automatically connects with my ipad signed in to the same  ID. No pairing/unpairing/repairing required. This adds a great value to the user experience. Just take out your TWS from the case and they are good to go!  2. Connection with multiple devices simultaneously: The airpods connect both to my ipad and phone. I can pick up my calls on my phone, switch to airpods and continue with my call. In case of another device, I would first need to unpair, repair and continue my call. This is another big bonus for me and simplifies things!  3. Good connectivity range and battery life: Battery life is decent. Will last you through long sessions of calls and online meetings. You can use mono or both airpods as per your choice.  What should you keep in mind before purchasing:  1. Price: These are some of the costliest devices in this category in the market. So you need to be doubly sure that they justify their value to you before you buy them.  2. Sound quality: Don't expect earth shattering bass from these. They are good to go daily use earphones. Powerful bass gives me a bad headache. Hence this was a bonus for me. However, the sound quality will be deal breaker for many. Do try them and listen to your playlist before you decide.  3. Strange shape: They fit perfectly into some ears while being a pain for others. Again, my advice is to try them in your ears before you purchase. If they feel uncomfortable after 5 minutes, you will regret buying them. You can purchase additional rubber pads/hooks for a good fit, but again that will set you back by 300-500 bucks. Hence, caution is advised!  Sincere advice: If you are buying them just to show your status quo of owning an  device ( many people do this, including myself - its absolutely normal with ), there are cheap lookalikes available for 200-500 bucks. Buy them, flaunt them and use the remaining sum in some other place!  For those looking to buy these for sound quality, do give these a try before purchasing. It may save you a lot of heartache later!  If you have reasons similar to mine, these airpods are excellent value for money, thanks to their good handshake with the  ecosystem. Wireless charging variant is a gimmick in my opinion - again see if you can justify shelling out those extra bucks for the ease of wireless charging these maybe once a week!  Hope the review helps!  PS: Do buy a case; these are very prone to scratches given their glossy finish!

title: Genuine Apple Airpods. Connects seamlessly
body: I went through a lot of reviews before ordering this from Amazon. I was apprehensive as some reviews mentioned they received fake or used products.  On receiving the product the first thing I did was check the genuineness of the product in Apple website. It was genuine. And similar to other Apple products syncs seamlessly.  Also there are a lot of reviews on noise cancellation. Apple does not advertise AirPods as noise cancellation earphones. They come with Noise Reduction tech.  I am deducting a star on the premise that I had to struggle with the warranty period. When I received the item it was mentioned as October 2021. And I had to contact Apple Care and provide them with Invoice and PD copy for the warranty period to be corrected. It took about 24 hrs but thankfully it is updated now.

title: Best TWS under 12k
body: I've been using these Airpods since last 3 weeks and the experience with iPhone has been flawless. Yes u can find TWS having Better sound and bass but it's the convenience of the apple ecosystem that you are paying for and to be very frank I didn't find anything wrong while Calling or listening to music.  Calling: Call clarity has been fantastic, No voice break or jitter while talking to someone. Bass has been good if not fantastic.  Siri: Siri has been life saver for me, it's like U just have to ask your personal "Jarvis" and it'll do most of the things for u.  Battery : On a full charge it can work for almost 4 hours straight and trust me that's enough for a single time use and you can charge you pods atleast 2 times again from the case.  Comfort: Using them for long time ( atleast 1 hour) can create discomfort in your ears since they don't have silicon tips but plastic head  Overall a good package and a recommendable product for all  P.S : I've put a case on my earpods so please don't ask Amazon to ship it complimentary 😆

title: Battery backup
body: After using 6 months airpods single time battery backup is only 90 min and that is not sufficient after spending 13000rs And I’m not happy from APPLE Product sound quality is good but battery backup is not sufficient. And I recommend don’t buy apple products from amazon flipkart .Buy only from apple Store.

title: Super Product by Apple
body: Initially I was very skeptical in buying apple product from amazon but eventually I did and also made an unboxing video just to make sure that I dont get a stone inside the packet but yes, amazon hasn’t disappointed me even once in 3 yrs of being there customer and neither did it happen this time. I had been using friend’s airpods for a while now but thought of buying my own after amazon gave a good deal at it. The airpods are really comfy and good. the battery life is too good. I charge my case for an hour in which it fully charges and with one charge the airpods actually lasts upto 24hrs of usage. If somebody is confused between buying the new pro or this one and has a budget constraint, I would recommend you go for this one coz the only plus point in the pro ones is the sweat resistance and noise cancellation. pretty much everything else about 2 is better than Pro. PS. my stars would go down because I gave noise cancellation 2 stars.

title: Very helpful if you own devices on  ecosystem
body: I purchased this product to use it with my iphone and ipad, whose use has grown due to the online meeting and videoconferencing calls in this pandemic. The airpods are on the pricier side, thanks to the  branding. In today's era when wireless earbuds are available for as low as 2k, why settle for these?? I have some reasons of my own, which may/may not fit your case. Read on to decide.  1. Seamless connectivity with  devices: the most important reason for me. Once I connected it to my phone, it automatically connects with my ipad signed in to the same  ID. No pairing/unpairing/repairing required. This adds a great value to the user experience. Just take out your TWS from the case and they are good to go!  2. Connection with multiple devices simultaneously: The airpods connect both to my ipad and phone. I can pick up my calls on my phone, switch to airpods and continue with my call. In case of another device, I would first need to unpair, repair and continue my call. This is another big bonus for me and simplifies things!  3. Good connectivity range and battery life: Battery life is decent. Will last you through long sessions of calls and online meetings. You can use mono or both airpods as per your choice.  What should you keep in mind before purchasing:  1. Price: These are some of the costliest devices in this category in the market. So you need to be doubly sure that they justify their value to you before you buy them.  2. Sound quality: Don't expect earth shattering bass from these. They are good to go daily use earphones. Powerful bass gives me a bad headache. Hence this was a bonus for me. However, the sound quality will be deal breaker for many. Do try them and listen to your playlist before you decide.  3. Strange shape: They fit perfectly into some ears while being a pain for others. Again, my advice is to try them in your ears before you purchase. If they feel uncomfortable after 5 minutes, you will regret buying them. You can purchase additional rubber pads/hooks for a good fit, but again that will set you back by 300-500 bucks. Hence, caution is advised!  Sincere advice: If you are buying them just to show your status quo of owning an  device ( many people do this, including myself - its absolutely normal with ), there are cheap lookalikes available for 200-500 bucks. Buy them, flaunt them and use the remaining sum in some other place!  For those looking to buy these for sound quality, do give these a try before purchasing. It may save you a lot of heartache later!  If you have reasons similar to mine, these airpods are excellent value for money, thanks to their good handshake with the  ecosystem. Wireless charging variant is a gimmick in my opinion - again see if you can justify shelling out those extra bucks for the ease of wireless charging these maybe once a week!  Hope the review helps!  PS: Do buy a case; these are very prone to scratches given their glossy finish!

title: Is it really for you?
body: Apple Airpods are one of the best pieces of technology ever built by apple. If you buy one, you'll hold one of the most complicated designed but a very well built piece of tech at this price.  My first glance at the Airpods was pretty delusional. Still being in the Apple ecosystem I wanted to try it. You will never experience the same pairing method in any other wireless earbud. Thanks to the H1 chip inside it. Pop the case open, hold it near your device and magic begins. The older versions of iPhone may have a tough time connecting to it because the W1 chip was introduced from iPhone 7 onwards. If you have one and find yourself struggling connecting to your device, it's normal.  I personally find the Airpods a great fit and they do not fall from your ears even when you're running or sweating in the gym. The audio is well balanced and are comparable to the Apple Earpods. Sometimes even better. If you're an audiophile and a bass person, go for a better option like the Powerbeats pro. Another pro is the ergonomics and design of Airpods. They fit inside your denim's coin pocket perfectly. Yes they're that small.  Touch controls are sometimes hard to get right. You don't tap on the Airpods but to hit hard on it with your finger couple times to get it working. The touch controls can be customised by getting into the bluetooth menu. "Hey siri" is always on listening mode so you can make calls, get directions, send texts, set reminders, change volume levels and much more.  So is it really for you? Well, it depends. If you're into Apple Ecosystem, have some decent amount of money to spare and you're looking for wireless earbuds to listen to music and attend calls, go for it. They are also great for people who travel thanks to its compact size. If you're into audio monitoring, sound design, video editing or some similar professional work, this might not be the ideal option.  To conclude, Airpods are an amazing piece of technology ever built by Apple. They won't let you down if you're into listening to music, attending calls and give instructions to siri. If you have one already and are disappointed, they are not meant for you. Look for a better option.

title: Best TWS under 12k
body: I've been using these Airpods since last 3 weeks and the experience with iPhone has been flawless. Yes u can find TWS having Better sound and bass but it's the convenience of the apple ecosystem that you are paying for and to be very frank I didn't find anything wrong while Calling or listening to music.  Calling: Call clarity has been fantastic, No voice break or jitter while talking to someone. Bass has been good if not fantastic.  Siri: Siri has been life saver for me, it's like U just have to ask your personal "Jarvis" and it'll do most of the things for u.  Battery : On a full charge it can work for almost 4 hours straight and trust me that's enough for a single time use and you can charge you pods atleast 2 times again from the case.  Comfort: Using them for long time ( atleast 1 hour) can create discomfort in your ears since they don't have silicon tips but plastic head  Overall a good package and a recommendable product for all  P.S : I've put a case on my earpods so please don't ask Amazon to ship it complimentary 😆

Comfort: Using them for long time ( atleast 1 hour) can create discomfort in your ears since they don't have silicon tips but plastic head  Overall a good package and a recommendable product for all  P.S : I've put a case on my earpods so please don't ask Amazon to ship it complimentary 😆

title: Battery backup
body: After using 6 months airpods single time battery backup is only 90 min and that is not sufficient after spending 13000rs And I’m not happy from APPLE Product sound quality is good but battery backup is not sufficient. And I recommend don’t buy apple products from amazon flipkart .Buy only from apple Store.

title: Super Product by Apple
body: Initially I was very skeptical in buying apple product from amazon but eventually I did and also made an unboxing video just to make sure that I dont get a stone inside the packet but yes, amazon hasn’t disappointed me even once in 3 yrs of being there customer and neither did it happen this time. I had been using friend’s airpods for a while now but thought of buying my own after amazon gave a good deal at it. The airpods are really comfy and good. the battery life is too good. I charge my case for an hour in which it fully charges and with one charge the airpods actually lasts upto 24hrs of usage. If somebody is confused between buying the new pro or this one and has a budget constraint, I would recommend you go for this one coz the only plus point in the pro ones is the sweat resistance and noise cancellation. pretty much everything else about 2 is better than Pro. PS. my stars would go down because I gave noise cancellation 2 stars.

title: The reason I bough ans iPhone is AirPods
body: This is a more innovative product than the iPhone. Before buying one go to an apple store and get a feel whether it fits your ears properly as this comes in one fit and size only. It is worth the cost only if you are in the Apple ecosystem, it has seamless integration between apple devices. The only issue you will face is if you are connected to a Mac you will need to disconnect Mac pairing to connect to iPhone. Connecting to the iPhone is easy. If your one airpod shows different battery life compared to second don't worry its normal. Hope it lasts minimum 2 years.

title: Great product but without noise cancellation

Although one should not buy these if looking for active noise cancellation as these do not support that. Also, look for a cover for the charging case as it can easily get scratches.

title: Apple Airpods 2 - Just Magical :)
body: Love for Apple products never ends though everything is over priced... Thanks to their custom-built W1 chip, Hey siri works like a charm... Purchased it for ₹ 11700 in Amazon Global Prime day..  Pros: 1. Connects fast 2. Hey siri function 3. Fast charging (it took only less than 30 mins to full charge Airpods case)  Cons: 1. Absorbs all sorts of dirt's (Even when you touch them with bare cleaned hand) 2. Easily scratch-able, Forced myself to buy leather case for protection.

title: Sound quality is very happening
body: I use this product while working out and it motivates me a lot

title: Decent sound with great design and integration into iOS
body: In India, Apple products are terribly overpriced but i guess we have no choice to bear with this until Apple does more manufacturing locally. This is one of the main reasons i was warding off purchasing this for sometime now.  Coming to the device itself, the pros i see are 1. It is easily pocketable 2. Great build quality of the case 3. Good comfortable hold in the ears for walking 4. Extremely quick connection 5. Automatic ear detection (pauses on taking it out the ear) 6. Can use both the pods individually (good for podcasts or general videos and instantly doubles battery life) 7. Awesome integration with iOS devices  Cons would be: 1. Expensive in India 2. Multiple spots in the case and on the pods that can accumulate dust 3. Average sound quality especially for the price 4. Has some minor connection issues now and then when you'd need to set the output to airpods again.  I have considered products like elite 75t, sony 1000XM3 but what ultimately pushed me to buy this is the integration with iOS devices. If you own a iOS device, i think it is very hard not to consider these.

title: Amazing just like any other apple product. But with flaws.
body: Great product. I'd recommend this to all Apple lovers.  Seamless pairing with with iphone. However, not on Macbook.  Sound quality is not great but way better than earpods. I like the glossy look but it may not last long.  A heavily priced product, but I think that's what apple does in pricing any of it's products.  As of now I'm loving the AirPods and I have to wait and see how they make me feel in the long run.  Coming to battery life there's a drastic battery drain on iphone as the bluetooth has to be turned on always. Earpods consume the minimum amount of battery power. A 1% to 2% battery usage(on iphone), while listening to music using earpods for an hour is equal to 10%(approximately) battery usage with AirPods for the same time.  The best thing is you can get rid of wire. That's what I've mainly purchased for. AirPods do not fall from ear so easily even while running.  After Using them for a couple of days:  There are equal number of flaws as well. AirPods discharge when they are kept outside even when you don't use them. It means you have to keep it in the case all the time you are not using them and that's what Apple also wants us to do. I wonder what happens to the battery life because we are overcharging them several times a day. And the charge cycles are gonna be very irregular. In my case, AirPods battery status never came below 60% because I have to keep them back in the case when I don't use them. After all they are batteries and they age. I wish Apple bothered to give some assurance to their customers.  Another one is, the lid, when opened tilts if you try. They could've improved the quality. It seems like these AirPods won't last more than a couple of years.

title: Very helpful if you own devices on  ecosystem
body: I purchased this product to use it with my iphone and ipad, whose use has grown due to the online meeting and videoconferencing calls in this pandemic. The airpods are on the pricier side, thanks to the  branding. In today's era when wireless earbuds are available for as low as 2k, why settle for these?? I have some reasons of my own, which may/may not fit your case. Read on to decide.  1. Seamless connectivity with  devices: the most important reason for me. Once I connected it to my phone, it automatically connects with my ipad signed in to the same  ID. No pairing/unpairing/repairing required. This adds a great value to the user experience. Just take out your TWS from the case and they are good to go!  2. Connection with multiple devices simultaneously: The airpods connect both to my ipad and phone. I can pick up my calls on my phone, switch to airpods and continue with my call. In case of another device, I would first need to unpair, repair and continue my call. This is another big bonus for me and simplifies things!  3. Good connectivity range and battery life: Battery life is decent. Will last you through long sessions of calls and online meetings. You can use mono or both airpods as per your choice.  What should you keep in mind before purchasing:  1. Price: These are some of the costliest devices in this category in the market. So you need to be doubly sure that they justify their value to you before you buy them.  2. Sound quality: Don't expect earth shattering bass from these. They are good to go daily use earphones. Powerful bass gives me a bad headache. Hence this was a bonus for me. However, the sound quality will be deal breaker for many. Do try them and listen to your playlist before you decide.  3. Strange shape: They fit perfectly into some ears while being a pain for others. Again, my advice is to try them in your ears before you purchase. If they feel uncomfortable after 5 minutes, you will regret buying them. You can purchase additional rubber pads/hooks for a good fit, but again that will set you back by 300-500 bucks. Hence, caution is advised!  Sincere advice: If you are buying them just to show your status quo of owning an  device ( many people do this, including myself - its absolutely normal with ), there are cheap lookalikes available for 200-500 bucks. Buy them, flaunt them and use the remaining sum in some other place!  For those looking to buy these for sound quality, do give these a try before purchasing. It may save you a lot of heartache later!  If you have reasons similar to mine, these airpods are excellent value for money, thanks to their good handshake with the  ecosystem. Wireless charging variant is a gimmick in my opinion - again see if you can justify shelling out those extra bucks for the ease of wireless charging these maybe once a week!  Hope the review helps!  PS: Do buy a case; these are very prone to scratches given their glossy finish!

title: Is it really for you?
body: Apple Airpods are one of the best pieces of technology ever built by apple. If you buy one, you'll hold one of the most complicated designed but a very well built piece of tech at this price.  My first glance at the Airpods was pretty delusional. Still being in the Apple ecosystem I wanted to try it. You will never experience the same pairing method in any other wireless earbud. Thanks to the H1 chip inside it. Pop the case open, hold it near your device and magic begins. The older versions of iPhone may have a tough time connecting to it because the W1 chip was introduced from iPhone 7 onwards. If you have one and find yourself struggling connecting to your device, it's normal.  I personally find the Airpods a great fit and they do not fall from your ears even when you're running or sweating in the gym. The audio is well balanced and are comparable to the Apple Earpods. Sometimes even better. If you're an audiophile and a bass person, go for a better option like the Powerbeats pro. Another pro is the ergonomics and design of Airpods. They fit inside your denim's coin pocket perfectly. Yes they're that small.  Touch controls are sometimes hard to get right. You don't tap on the Airpods but to hit hard on it with your finger couple times to get it working. The touch controls can be customised by getting into the bluetooth menu. "Hey siri" is always on listening mode so you can make calls, get directions, send texts, set reminders, change volume levels and much more.  So is it really for you? Well, it depends. If you're into Apple Ecosystem, have some decent amount of money to spare and you're looking for wireless earbuds to listen to music and attend calls, go for it. They are also great for people who travel thanks to its compact size. If you're into audio monitoring, sound design, video editing or some similar professional work, this might not be the ideal option.  To conclude, Airpods are an amazing piece of technology ever built by Apple. They won't let you down if you're into listening to music, attending calls and give instructions to siri. If you have one already and are disappointed, they are not meant for you. Look for a better option.

title: Genuine Apple Airpods. Connects seamlessly
body: I went through a lot of reviews before ordering this from Amazon. I was apprehensive as some reviews mentioned they received fake or used products.  On receiving the product the first thing I did was check the genuineness of the product in Apple website. It was genuine. And similar to other Apple products syncs seamlessly.  Also there are a lot of reviews on noise cancellation. Apple does not advertise AirPods as noise cancellation earphones. They come with Noise Reduction tech.  I am deducting a star on the premise that I had to struggle with the warranty period. When I received the item it was mentioned as October 2021. And I had to contact Apple Care and provide them with Invoice and PD copy for the warranty period to be corrected. It took about 24 hrs but thankfully it is updated now.

title: Best TWS under 12k
body: I've been using these Airpods since last 3 weeks and the experience with iPhone has been flawless. Yes u can find TWS having Better sound and bass but it's the convenience of the apple ecosystem that you are paying for and to be very frank I didn't find anything wrong while Calling or listening to music.  Calling: Call clarity has been fantastic, No voice break or jitter while talking to someone. Bass has been good if not fantastic.  Siri: Siri has been life saver for me, it's like U just have to ask your personal "Jarvis" and it'll do most of the things for u.  Battery : On a full charge it can work for almost 4 hours straight and trust me that's enough for a single time use and you can charge you pods atleast 2 times again from the case.  Comfort: Using them for long time ( atleast 1 hour) can create discomfort in your ears since they don't have silicon tips but plastic head  Overall a good package and a recommendable product for all  P.S : I've put a case on my earpods so please don't ask Amazon to ship it complimentary 😆

title: Battery backup
body: After using 6 months airpods single time battery backup is only 90 min and that is not sufficient after spending 13000rs And I’m not happy from APPLE Product sound quality is good but battery backup is not sufficient. And I recommend don’t buy apple products from amazon flipkart .Buy only from apple Store.

title: Super Product by Apple
body: Initially I was very skeptical in buying apple product from amazon but eventually I did and also made an unboxing video just to make sure that I dont get a stone inside the packet but yes, amazon hasn’t disappointed me even once in 3 yrs of being there customer and neither did it happen this time. I had been using friend’s airpods for a while now but thought of buying my own after amazon gave a good deal at it. The airpods are really comfy and good. the battery life is too good. I charge my case for an hour in which it fully charges and with one charge the airpods actually lasts upto 24hrs of usage. If somebody is confused between buying the new pro or this one and has a budget constraint, I would recommend you go for this one coz the only plus point in the pro ones is the sweat resistance and noise cancellation. pretty much everything else about 2 is better than Pro. PS. my stars would go down because I gave noise cancellation 2 stars.

You can use mono or both airpods as per your choice.  What should you keep in mind before purchasing:  1. Price: These are some of the costliest devices in this category in the market. So you need to be doubly sure that they justify their value to you before you buy them.  2. Sound quality: Don't expect earth shattering bass from these. They are good to go daily use earphones. Powerful bass gives me a bad headache. Hence this was a bonus for me. However, the sound quality will be deal breaker for many. Do try them and listen to your playlist before you decide.  3. Strange shape: They fit perfectly into some ears while being a pain for others. Again, my advice is to try them in your ears before you purchase. If they feel uncomfortable after 5 minutes, you will regret buying them. You can purchase additional rubber pads/hooks for a good fit, but again that will set you back by 300-500 bucks. Hence, caution is advised!  Sincere advice: If you are buying them just to show your status quo of owning an  device ( many people do this, including myself - its absolutely normal with ), there are cheap lookalikes available for 200-500 bucks. Buy them, flaunt them and use the remaining sum in some other place!  For those looking to buy these for sound quality, do give these a try before purchasing. It may save you a lot of heartache later!  If you have reasons similar to mine, these airpods are excellent value for money, thanks to their good handshake with the  ecosystem. Wireless charging variant is a gimmick in my opinion - again see if you can justify shelling out those extra bucks for the ease of wireless charging these maybe once a week!  Hope the review helps!  PS: Do buy a case; these are very prone to scratches given their glossy finish!
